business_snapshot.description: Bootstrapped coaching SaaS selling monthly subscriptions to coaches.
business_snapshot.goal: Double monthly recurring revenue in 6 months

bottlenecks.name: Lack of defined KPIs
bottlenecks.diagnosis: Absence of clear metrics to measure progress and success
tactical_fix: Identify key metrics aligned with business goals

analysis.top_recommendation: Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure progress towards doubling monthly recurring revenue

proposed_kpis.why: Essential to monitor customer retention and revenue stability
To ensure cost-effectiveness of acquiring new customers

analysis.summary: The business lacks defined KPIs to measure progress towards the goal of doubling monthly recurring revenue in 6 months. It is crucial to identify and track key metrics such as MRR growth rate, Churn rate, and CAC to ensure effective monitoring and optimization of revenue generation and customer retention.

bottlenecks.name: Low Conversion Rate of Strategy Sessions
bottlenecks.diagnosis: Messaging or offer may not resonate with target audience
tactical_fix: Reassess offer and messaging alignment with student needs

analysis.top_recommendation: Reassess offer and messaging alignment with student needs

proposed_kpis.why: To measure effectiveness of offer and messaging
To track improvement in connecting with target audience
To monitor revenue generated per strategy session

analysis.summary: To double monthly recurring revenue in 6 months, focus on improving conversion rate of strategy sessions by reassessing offer and messaging alignment with student needs, and increasing audience connection efforts.

bottlenecks.name: Lead Acquisition
bottlenecks.diagnosis: Need to optimize lead generation channels to increase quantity and quality of leads.
tactical_fix: Track cost per lead and optimize for quality + quantity
Utilize paid ads to speed up growth and organic methods to build trust

analysis.top_recommendation: Focus on improving lead acquisition strategies to drive more leads and improve conversion rates.

proposed_kpis.why: To measure the effectiveness of lead nurturing and sales processes
To track the value generated from each customer over their lifetime
To monitor customer retention and identify areas for improvement

analysis.summary: The key bottleneck identified is lead acquisition, requiring immediate attention to optimize lead generation channels and improve lead quality and quantity.
